ai.behavior:
when ally is occupied use -Command Minion- on it
!when enemy has ailment bruised and 2 ability it use -Ancestral Revenge- on most enemy
!when enemy has ailment bruised use full Move to enemy for -Ancestral Revenge-
when adjacent ally and nearby enemy use -Summon War Gong-
when 1 melee ally is occupied use Move to it
!when enemy has ailment bleeding and it has 6 movement use -Bleed- on it
when ally is occupied and ! it has vigor intimidating use -Superior Presence- on it
when use Move to mightiest melee ally
